channel.title: So basically, I tried adding korasi. This is what I got when I spawned it:
channel.description: Systemet finner ikke angitt bane. Pk-soft Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 2183 521 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -70 at Model.method479(Model.java:1556) at ItemDef.method201(ItemDef.java:411) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:276) at client.drawInterface(client.java:9202) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2635) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8991) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9829) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:5583) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662)

item.title: So basically, I tried adding korasi. This is what I got when I spawned it:
item.dc:creator: @Tobbescape Tobbescape
item.description:
@Tobbescape wrote:

case 13350:
itemDef.name = “Korasi’s sword”;
itemDef.description = “The sword of a Void Knight.”.getBytes();
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wield”;
itemDef.modelID = 57784;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 57780;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1400;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 700;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 60;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 25;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 60;
break;
